greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Period in residues modulo n in iteration of x^2 + 1 starting at 0.
comment: a(n) is a period in the sequence A003095 modulo n.
For n <= 10000 is the maximal period a(7921) = 1232.
For n <= 100000 is the maximal period a(73205) = 7260.
For n <= 500000 is the maximal period a(357911) = 54670.
link: Vaclav Kotesovec, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..100000
example: n=7, residues are 1, 2, 5, 5, 5, 5, 5, ... , final period is 1, therefore a(7)=1.
This program is for experiments (n<100): Rest[NestList[Mod[#^2+1, n] &, 0, 100]]
results.author: _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Oct 04 2014
